Package entities

Class Caveman

java.lang.Object
entities.Entity
entities.Caveman
public class Caveman extends Entity
Caveman class

It is a hostile to the player and if player is in chasing range of it, it starts to chase player.

If player is in attacking range, it attacks to player.

If player gets in and out of range, it returns to initialization position (startX, startY)

Author:
Tayfun Ozdemir

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics g)
      Draws all the sprites and animations, if Caveman is dead, returns nothing and leaves the function and draws nothing all the time
      Specified by:
      draw in class Entity
      Parameters:
      g - it is a needed instance of Graphics to be able to draw sprites

    • update

      public void update()
      Runs 200 times per second, calls some functions and updates everything.

      If Caveman is dead, returns nothing to leave function. So nothing is updated no more.

      Specified by:
      update in class Entity
